content: This is a great article and I agree that with or without a MBA founders can create ideas and grow them to multi-million dollar companies. However, it’s all too easy to focus on the “Unicorns” that make up a very small portion of the total startup ecosystem nationwide. There are many companies that are valued sub a billion that are still building value. To see a true picture of MBA founders vs Non-MBA, a full analysis would need to be completed.
